jobDescription: SIS Integration and Data Analyst Location: Upper Valley Role Mission: The SIS Integration and Data Analyst enhances, administers and supports the student information system and infrastructure for the district. This includes analyzing student data pipeline processes and aligning system capabilities to improve these processes. The SIS Integration and Data Analyst consults with stakeholders and collaborates on systems’ projects to eliminate ineffective data management and improve data accuracy and partners with internal and external stakeholders to ensure student data synchronization across other systems. Lastly, the SIS Integration and Data Analyst updates the SIS team on new technology by participating in professional development; reading professional publications, and maintaining professional networks.  The mission for the SIS Integration and Data Analyst is to achieve 97.5% average daily attendance, 100% enrollment, maintain 100% data accuracy,100% compliance with IDEA’s attendance procedures, softwares connected to student information system are syncing properly, and student information system is available for the entire district during school operation to which it is being utilized for its capabilities. The SIS Integration and Data Analyst safeguards the security and integrity of student information and data reporting. Accountabilities:1. Meets (or exceeds) an Average Daily Attendance (ADA) of 97.5% Across the Network and 100% Compliance with IDEA’s attendance procedures. * Partners with internal and external stakeholders to develop and implement innovative technology to maximize efficiency in the ADA process.  * Streamline data automation for the ADA Dashboard.  * Develop and maintain ADA Data Quality Framework by use of data validation controls and data audit reports that identify “dirty” data 2. 100% Data Accuracy measured by PEIMS State Submissions * Collaborates with SIS team members and utilize data automation to reduce manual entry of data  * Collaborates with SIS team and campus teams to provide efficient and effective strategies to support staff in the data collection process. 3. 100% Cross Functional (Peripheral) Software Integration * Partners with Program Innovation Team to ensure Blending learning systems are integrated with SIS  * Partners with Academic Services to ensure systems are integrated with SIS  * Collaborates with School Operations to ensure systems are integrated with SIS  * Develops setup process for software connected to student information system.  * Ensure software connect to student information are synchronizing appropriately by start of school.  * Evaluate integration requirements annually with partners.  * Controls solution by establishing specifications; coordinating production with programmers.  * Validates results by testing software connections 4. 85% Retention of SIS Coordinators and Registrars * Customizes tools and support for SIS and Registrars to use in the field.  * Develops tracking mechanisms manage around Campus Operations and SIS goals.  * Customizes the onboarding practices to ensure each new team member is set up for success based on the unique responsibilities of their role.  * Develops and executes differentiated professional development focused first and foremost on student compliance, attendance tracking to build technical capacity.  * Develops ease of use of student information system.  * Minimizes work for IDEA stakeholders towards student information system. 5.
